value.title: Researchers Can Tell If You’re Going To Break Up Just By The Language You Use
value.excerpt: Evidence of an impending breakup may exist in the small words used in everyday conversations months before either partner realizes where their relationship is heading, according to new psychology research.

value.title: Spotify is developing speech-recognition tech to detect your mood and suggest music

value.title: China growing use of emotion recognition tech raises rights concerns
value.excerpt: Technology that measures emotions based on biometric indicators such as facial movements, tone of voice or body movements, is increasingly being marketed in China, researchers say, despite concerns about its accuracy and wider human rights implications.
